comments:
This issue occurs intermittenly and it is hard to pin down but does occure in 
due course.
In a new workspace create a new java project. And in this project create a 
number of Visiual Classes using various AWT and Swing styles. This error should 
then pop up along the way...

Sometimes occurs when creating a new java Visual Class extending a jPanel.

I believe this turned up when testing on the latest maintenance builds of
Eclipse, EMF, and GEF. And it may be due the EMF bug 72056. 

Please try this on a the latest VE build that is based on Eclipse 3.0, EMF 2.0,
and GEF 2.0. If it's a problem on that, then reopen this bug.
Since this bug was not reOpened for more than a month, this bug is verified.
